content.raw:
I tweaked the geometry in `collide_bitmask.world` in 9176887dbebc (branch collision_bitmask_scpeters) to clarify which objects are colliding with each other. I think this would improve the test, though I haven't updated the test expectations yet. I need to go to bed.
